sources.title: Arizona Bad Man (1935) REB RUSSELL
sources.description:
Stars: Reb Russell, Rebel, Lois January
Director: S. Roy Luby

The daughter of a notorious cattle thief falls for a stranger at a dance. The stranger is really a lawman who is after her father.

metadata.Plot: Bart and Pedro have rustled cattle and have now made a deal with the outlaw Sonny Karns to take them across the border. Learning that the Cattlemen's Association has sent a man, Bart sets a trap for him. Lucy warns Steve but when Steve tries to rescue Lucy and her young brother Dave, Pedro and his men capture him.
